MNKD Scripts are actually on pace with my predictions Last week was a legitimate 4 day week although I would also argue that there were some significant holidays throughout the week that took a bite out of the scripts In addition to Memorial Day we had May 28 National Hamburger Day May 29 Learn About Composting Day May 30 Mint Julep Day May 30 Water a Flower Day May 31 National Macaroon Day May 31 Save Your Hearing Day Jokes aside the 5 day adjusted numbers would be more like TRx 780 and rev around 119m Harrys chart gives you a good idea where things are headed and it is nowhere but up

MNKD A this point its not worth seconding guessing Mannkinds decision to use a solo strategy to sell Afrezza in the United States that is now approaching 2 years in July 2019 Good or Bad Right or Wrong the reality today is Mannkinds solo strategy has delivered some results getting weekly scripts TRx closing in on 800 RRx over 400 NRx just over 300 Sales over 1 million I believe the numbers may continue to grow somewhat from here but have plateaued not because Afrezza isnt wanted or needed but because its being woefully unfunded with cash and resources The fact Mannkind isnt doing much to expand their sales force tells me they hopefully finally realize they have maxed out their solo strategy and need a partner to transition Afrezzas growth to the next level

MNKD Afrezza suffered with an unreliable big pharma partner SNY under funding inexperience MNKD SNY initiates commercial launch in the United States on 22015 that coincides with the firing of Chris Viehbacher CEO an advocate for Afrezza replaces him with Oliver Brandicourt CEO who comes into the job with a huge bias against Afrezza From day one it appears Brandicourt immediately decides to pull back support for Afrezza and was willing to wait out one year termination period to end partnership with MNKD SNY terminates Afrezza deal Jan 2016 and MNKD got back commercial rights in 42016 building out a commercial organization to support a solo strategy Afrezza was relaunched as a MNKD branded drug in July 2016 using a contract sales force MNKD then discontinues using contract sales reps and transitioned to have an internal MNKD sales org in 22017 Today MNKD continues solo sales strategy under funded with a small sales org top heavy management Partner Needed
